title: (x) Arsenal - Clearface Gothic {Yves}
content:
Any ideas?   
The '.com' looks like Meta or similar, but what's the main Arsenal face?   
 ![Arsenal logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013183624im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21126.jpg)

author: steve_p

comments.content: [Clearface Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013183624/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clearface-gothic/lh-65-medium/testdrive.html?s=Arsenal&p=48). You're right about the FF Meta.
